attributes.action: support and act on Goldstone Report, to hold Israel and Hamas to account for their actions in Gaza in December 08/January 09, and also to press for an end to the continuing seige of Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition asks for a positive response in favour of the Goldstone Report and asks the PM and UK Government to support the Report, its adoption by the UN Security Council, and implementation of the recommendations made in the Report.  The seige of Gaza continues; a second request is to press (harder) for it to be lifted, on humanitarian grounds.
There are two existing petitions: to reject the Goldstone report, and to ask what is the UK government position.  Neither seek support for Goldstone, as this one does.  There appears to be no other facility in epetitions to vote against an existing petition, except to present an opposing petition like this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
